DESCRIPTION: The image depicts a modern kitchen with a variety of appliances and furniture. The kitchen is characterized by a white color scheme, with white cabinets and appliances. The cabinets are adorned with gold handles, adding a touch of elegance to the space.

The kitchen is equipped with a stainless steel refrigerator, oven, and microwave, all of which are neatly integrated into the design. A sink is also present in the kitchen, providing a functional space for washing dishes.

The kitchen features a large island in the center
